bnmr 0.0.0.9001
  • Reference

Kijang Emas

Source: R/monthly.R
kijang_emas.Rd

This function allows you to obtain daily trading prices of Malaysia gold bullion coin from the BNM API.

kijang_emas(date = NULL, year = NULL, month = NULL)

Arguments

date

Character string of date with format as defined by RFC 3339, section 5.6 (YYYY-MM-DD). If specified, return values for the specified date.
year

Year and month as integers. If date, year and month left blank, return today's values.
month

Year and month as integers. If date, year and month left blank, return today's values.

Source

https://api.bnm.gov.my/

Examples

kijang_emas()
#> $effective_date
#> [1] "2019-05-03"
#> 
#> $one_oz
#> $one_oz$buying
#> [1] 5384
#> 
#> $one_oz$selling
#> [1] 5599
#> 
#> 
#> $half_oz
#> $half_oz$buying
#> [1] 2692
#> 
#> $half_oz$selling
#> [1] 2852
#> 
#> 
#> $quarter_oz
#> $quarter_oz$buying
#> [1] 1346
#> 
#> $quarter_oz$selling
#> [1] 1453
#> 
#> 
kijang_emas(date = "2018-01-03")
#> $effective_date
#> [1] "2018-01-03"
#> 
#> $one_oz
#> $one_oz$buying
#> [1] 5415
#> 
#> $one_oz$selling
#> [1] 5632
#> 
#> 
#> $half_oz
#> $half_oz$buying
#> [1] 2708
#> 
#> $half_oz$selling
#> [1] 2869
#> 
#> 
#> $quarter_oz
#> $quarter_oz$buying
#> [1] 1354
#> 
#> $quarter_oz$selling
#> [1] 1461
#> 
#> 
kijang_emas(year = 2016, month = 2)
#>    effective_date one_oz.buying one_oz.selling half_oz.buying half_oz.selling
